Hi Joel,

My bad - missed this reply. Thanks for the updates.

Yes scaling will be fine, could you please confirm best ratios?

I did notice that most images had gone back to rounded corners, but somehow this has changed again..? Could you advise please?



Thanks.

Regards,

Sacha Heaney Marketing & Sales Support http://aspeninteriors.com.au/ T 61 2 9854 6800 T 1800 646 186

Hi Sacha, 

Yes 3:2 is going to be the best option. The image in the left-hand-bottom corner is double width so may present some challenges. Do you have the team/software on your side to scale the photos to some exact dimensions? If so, I can send through what those should ideally be. 

I can confirm the rounded corners are also back.

Hi Joel,

Any update on this?

Thanks.

Regards,

Sacha Heaney Marketing & Sales Support http://aspeninteriors.com.au/ T 61 2 9854 6800 T 1800 646 186
@heath I have made the changes for the border radius.

Hi Joel,

Yes, these work better - thank you. Are you able to let me know if these are a standard ratio so that we can get the best possible fit when we upload new items? Ideally if they were 3:2 that would make our job easiest. Let me know if that's possible?



I have just noticed that the rounded corners to the frames seem to have dropped off since the update, could we get those back just to ensure it still matches the other blocks on the page please?

Thank you.



Regards,

Sacha Heaney Marketing & Sales Support http://aspeninteriors.com.au/ T 61 2 9854 6800 T 1800 646 186

From: Sacha Heaney | Aspen Interiors
Sent: Thursday, 7 April 2022 3:50 PM
To: WP Perk Support <support@wpperk.com>
Subject: Furniture Website updates


Hi Team,


Hoping you could help with a couple of updates to the website please.


We have noticed that the gallery of images on each of our product pages seem to show as very low res - see below example, or here: https://aspeninteriors.com.au/product/meridian-square-leg-workstation/ (same for all pages).


Once you click on the image, it opens to the full high-res, but obviously the previews are set as very low. A lot of people won't be clicking onto these pictures, just scrolling past, so we would prefer they are higher quality - is that something you could help with please?



The other issue with this gallery is where photos are anything other than landscape (like above). See below for example, what happens with portrait images - could you suggest a solution for this without sacrificing the overall design and aesthetic? Some of our pictures are outside of a standard image ratio, which we could fix if that would help (e.g. if the frames are set to either landscape or portrait, and our pictures fit into these, still in a 'gallery' layout, would that work?).



With our 'Seating' range especially, we are wanting to make it easy to filter/search by Tag (e.g. our seating range is made up of Task Chair/ Meeting Chair/ Soft Seating/ Ottoman etc. etc..) Currently the filter on the seating page (and all furniture pages) takes you back to the main menu, which doesn't seem correct.


Could this filter be changed to the below tags which I have already assigned to the products please?:
  • Ottoman
  • Soft Seating
  • Modular Seating
  • Meeting Chair
  • Task Chair
  • Executive Chair
  • Visitor Chair



Feel free to get back to me with any questions - thank you.


Kind Regards,

Sacha Heaney
Marketing & Sales Support
